original_text: And I saw one of his heads as it were wounded to death; and his deadly wound was healed: and all the world wondered after the beast.
korean_text: 그의 머리 하나가 상하여 죽게 된 것 같더니 그 죽게 되었던 상처가 나으매 온 땅이 놀랍게 여겨 짐승을 따르고

sentences.original_text: And I saw one of his heads
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나는 그의 머리 중 하나를 보았습니다

sentences.original_text: as it were wounded to death
and his deadly wound was healed
and all the world wondered after the beast
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 온 세상이 그 짐승을 따라 경이로워했습니다
